com.brightcove.player.view
Class BrightcoveVideoView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.FrameLayout
              com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveVideoView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, android.widget.MediaController.MediaPlayerControl, Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
SeamlessVideoView
@Emits(events={"didChangeList","didSelectSource","pause","play","prebufferNextVideo","readyToPlay","seekTo","selectSource","setSource","setVideo","stop","willChangeVideo"})
@ListensFor(events={"bufferedUpdate","completed","didPause","didPlay","didSeekTo","didSetSource","didStop","progress","seekTo","sourceNotPlayable","videoDurationChanged","willChangeVideo","willInterruptContent"})
public class BrightcoveVideoView
extends android.widget.FrameLayout
implements Component, android.widget.MediaController.MediaPlayerControl

BrightcoveVideoView is designed to be dropped into your XML layouts as a replacement for Android's native VideoView. It provides public methods to mirror that of VideoView, plus additional. It is designed to use the EventEmitter flow, and contains within it VideoDisplayComponent and VideoPlayController

See Also:
EventEmitter, VideoDisplayComponent, VideoPlaybackController, VideoView

setMediaController

public void setMediaController(android.widget.MediaController mediaController)
Used to attach a valid MediaController implementation to our view. If the view's parent is an instance of View, it will be used as the anchor. Otherwise, the BrightcoveVideoView will be used as the anchor.

Parameters:
mediaController - The MediaController object to attach

setMediaController

public void setMediaController(android.widget.MediaController mediaController,
                               android.view.View anchorView,
                               android.widget.MediaController.MediaPlayerControl mediaPlayerControl)
Used to attach a valid MediaController implementation to our view. The provided anchorView and mediaPlayerControl will replace existing values and can be null.

Parameters:
mediaController - The MediaController object to attach
anchorView -
mediaPlayerControl -

attachMediaController

protected void attachMediaController()
